00013 typedef struct _audioreceive{   
00014         t_pxobject              obj;
00015         void                    *obex;
00016         void                    *dumpout;                                               
00017 
00018         t_symbol                *attr_target;                                   
00019         t_object                *obj_target;                                    
00020         t_object                *obj_direct_target;                             
00021         
00022         long                    num_outputs;                                    
00023         float                   *audio_out[MAX_NUM_CHANNELS];   
00024         void                    *outlets[MAX_NUM_CHANNELS];
00025         int                             vs;                                                             
00026 } t_audioreceive;
00027 
00028 
00029 // Prototypes
00030 void    *audioreceive_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00031 void    audioreceive_free(t_audioreceive *x);
00032 void    audioreceive_assist(t_audioreceive *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00033 void    audioreceive_bang(t_audioreceive *x);
00034 t_int*  audioreceive_perform(t_int *w);
00035 void    audioreceive_dsp(t_audioreceive *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);

00038 
00039 // Globals
00040 static t_class          *s_audioreceive_class;
00041 
00042 
00043 /************************************************************************************/
00044 
00045 int main(void)
00046 {
00047         long attrflags = 0;
00048         t_class *c;
00049         t_object *attr;
00050         
00051         jamoma_init();
00052 
00053         // Define our class
00054         c = class_new("jcom.receive~", (method)audioreceive_new, (method)audioreceive_free, 
00055                 sizeof(t_audioreceive), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00056 
00057         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_audioreceive, obex));
00058 
00059         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)audioreceive_bang,           "bang",                 0);
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)audioreceive_dsp,            "dsp",                  A_CANT, 0);
00062     class_addmethod(c, (method)audioreceive_assist,             "assist",               A_CANT, 0);
00063     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",              A_CANT,0);  
00064     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref",     A_CANT, 0);
00065         
00066         // ATTRIBUTE: name
00067         attr = attr_offset_new("target", _sym_symbol, attrflags,
00068                 (method)0, (method)audioreceive_attr_settarget, calcoffset(t_audioreceive, attr_target));
00069         class_addattr(c, attr);
00070 
00071 
00072         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00073         class_dspinit(c);
00074         
00075         // Finalize our class
00076         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00077         s_audioreceive_class = c;
00078         
00079         return 0;
00080 }

00083 /************************************************************************************/
00084 // Object Life
00085 
00086 // Create
00087 void *audioreceive_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00088 {
00089         long                    attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00090         t_audioreceive  *x = (t_audioreceive *)object_alloc(s_audioreceive_class);
00091         short                   i;
00092         
00093         if(x){
00094                 x->dumpout = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00095                 object_obex_store(x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object *)x->dumpout);
00096 
00097                 x->attr_target = _sym_nothing;
00098                 x->num_outputs = 2;             // TODO: make this dynamic from args
00099 
00100                 for(i=0; i<attrstart; i++){
00101                         if(argv[i].a_type == A_LONG)
00102                                 x->num_outputs = atom_getlong(argv+i);
00103                         else if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM)
00104                                 x->attr_target = atom_getsym(argv+i);
00105                 }
00106                 
00107                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 1);
00108                 for(i=0; i < x->num_outputs; i++)
00109                         x->outlets[i] = outlet_new(x, "signal");
00110                 
00111                 x->obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;
00112                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args
00113         }
00114         return x;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void audioreceive_free(t_audioreceive *x)
00119 {
00120         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00121 }

00124 /************************************************************************************/
00125 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00126 
00127 // Method for Assistance Messages
00128 void audioreceive_assist(t_audioreceive *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00129 {
00130         if(msg==1)                      // Inlets
00131                 strcpy(dst, "input to send to a named module");
00132         else if(msg==2)         // Outlets
00133                 strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 // fill a menu with potential targets
00138 void audioreceive_bang(t_audioreceive *x)
00139 {
00140         t_atom          a[2];
00141         t_symbol        **moduleNames = NULL;
00142         long            numModules = 0;
00143         long            i;
00144 
00145         jamoma_get_all_module_names(&numModules, &moduleNames);
00146 
00147         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00148         outlet_anything(x->dumpout, gensym("menu"), 1, a);
00149         
00150         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00151         for(i=0; i<numModules; i++){
00152                 atom_setsym(a+1, moduleNames[i]);
00153                 outlet_anything(x->dumpout, gensym("menu"), 2, a);
00154         }
00155         if(moduleNames)
00156                 sysmem_freeptr(moduleNames);
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 t_int* audioreceive_perform(t_int *w)
00161 {
00162         t_audioreceive  *x = (t_audioreceive*)(w[1]);
00163         int                             channel;
00164         int                             n;
00165         float                   *vector = NULL;
00166         float                   *out;
00167         
00168         //object_method(x->obj_direct_target, gensym("remoteaudio"), x->audio_out, (long)(w[2]));
00169         for(channel = 0; channel < x->num_outputs; channel++){
00170                 n = x->vs;
00171                 object_method(x->obj_direct_target, gensym("getAudioForChannel"), channel, &vector);
00172                 out = x->audio_out[channel];
00173                 if(vector){
00174                         while(n--)
00175                                 *out++ = *vector++;
00176                 }
00177         }
00178         
00179         return(w+3);
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 void audioreceive_dsp(t_audioreceive *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00184 {
00185         long            numOutputs = x->num_outputs;
00186         short           i, j;
00187         t_object        *hub;
00188         
00189         if(x->attr_target && x->attr_target != _sym_nothing){
00190                 hub = jamoma_get_hub_for_module_named(x->attr_target);
00191                 if(hub != x->obj_target){
00192                         if(hub){
00193                                 x->obj_target = hub;
00194                                 // we could attach to the hub here to listen for free notifications
00195                                 // but freeing it will restart the dsp anyway, so I don't think there is any need [tap]
00196                                 x->obj_direct_target = (t_object*)object_method(hub, gensym("getobj_audioout"));
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199                 if(x->obj_target){
00200                         for(i=0, j=0; i<numOutputs; i++){
00201                                 if(count[i+1])          // the +1 is to account for the inlet in this object
00202                                         j=i;
00203                                 x->audio_out[i] = sp[i+1]->s_vec;
00204                         }
00205                         numOutputs = j+1;
00206                         
00207                         x->vs = sp[0]->s_n;
00208                         dsp_add(audioreceive_perform, 2, x, numOutputs);
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 }

00214 /************************************************************************************/
00215 
00216 t_max_err audioreceive_attr_settarget(t_audioreceive *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00217 {
00218         t_object        *hub;
00219 
00220         x->attr_target = atom_getsym(argv);
00221         hub = jamoma_get_hub_for_module_named(x->attr_target);
00222         if(hub){
00223                 x->obj_target = hub;
00224                 x->obj_direct_target = (t_object*)object_method(hub, gensym("getobj_audioout"));
00225         }
00226         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00227 }
